title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or Docker command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, exposing sync & async APIs for chat, generate, embed, pull and list models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers, providing chat, generate, pull and embeddings methods.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured, open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-model chats, file uploads and role management.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing generate, chat, pull, list and embeddings APIs with builder-style syntax.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, featuring syntax highlighting and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative with inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration enabling Ollama models as generators and embedders in production-ready RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama providing idiomatic client methods for chat, generate and model management.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# / .NET SDK for Ollama with async APIs and System.Text.Json serialization.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Open WebUI, GPU support and optional nginx.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector, PVC and HorizontalPodAutoscaler.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All UI fork that adds Ollama backend support, letting users switch between local llama.cpp and Ollama models.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Python Discord.py bot that exposes Ollama chat and image-generation commands with per-user rate limits.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack Bolt app that forwards @-mentions to an Ollama model and streams responses back to thread.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain to chat with local PDFs or GitHub repos.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service that proxies and extends Ollama endpoints with JWT auth, usage limits and request logging.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that uses Ollama for local LLM conversations with session memory and model picker.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing TypeScript-first client for Node and browsers, downloaded 50k+ times monthly.
